leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

tools.name: living-tree-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for taxonomical abundance remapping and feature engineering
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for taxonomical abundance remapping and feature engineering for taxonomic profiles, facilitating the manipulation of tree-based data.

tools.name: classify-genomes
tools.one_line_profile: Genome sequence classifier based on mOTUs/specI taxonomy
tools.detailed_description: A tool to classify genome sequences according to the mOTUs (metagenomic Operational Taxonomic Units) or specI taxonomy systems.

tools.name: progenomes_classifier
tools.one_line_profile: Classifier for assigning genomes to the specI taxonomy
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool designed to classify genomes into the specI taxonomy framework.

tools.name: SprayNPray
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid taxonomic profiling of genome and metagenome contigs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for rapid and simple taxonomic profiling of genome and metagenome contigs, useful for quick assessment of assembly composition.

tools.name: binchicken
tools.one_line_profile: Recovery of low abundance MAGs through strategic coassembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the recovery of low abundance and taxonomically targeted metagenome assembled genomes (MAGs) using strategic coassembly techniques.

tools.name: genome-assembly-summary
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to generate and combine genome assembly stats and taxonomy info
tools.detailed_description: A script used to generate and combine genome assembly statistics with taxonomic information, internally used with GeneLab workflows.

tools.name: PepGM
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical model for taxonomic profiling
tools.detailed_description: A probabilistic graphical model approach for taxonomic profiling of metagenomic data.

tools.name: biosteam
tools.one_line_profile: Biorefinery Simulation and Techno-Economic Analysis Modules
tools.detailed_description: A flexible platform for the simulation and techno-economic analysis of biorefineries, including life cycle assessment and chemical process simulation under uncertainty.

tools.name: 16S-Metatranscriptomic-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: NextFlow Pipelines for Qiime2 & Kraken2 metagenomic analyses
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Nextflow pipelines designed for 16S and metatranscriptomic analysis using Qiime2 and Kraken2.

tools.name: MEGAN (Atmospheric)
tools.one_line_profile: Model of Emissions of Gases and Aerosols from Nature
tools.detailed_description: A model for estimating biogenic emissions of volatile organic compounds (BVOCs) from vegetation. (Note: Distinct from the metagenomics tool MEGAN6).

tools.name: prepmegan4cmaq
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessor of MEGAN biogenic emissions for CMAQ model
tools.detailed_description: A data preprocessing tool to prepare MEGAN biogenic emission outputs for input into the CMAQ air quality model.

tools.name: MetageNN
tools.one_line_profile: Memory-efficient neural network taxonomic classifier
tools.detailed_description: A proof-of-concept neural network designed to provide a memory-efficient taxonomic classifier that is robust to sequencing errors and missing genomes.

tools.name: AutoWRFChem-Base
tools.one_line_profile: Automation for running WRF-Chem with NEI and MEGAN emissions
tools.detailed_description: A standalone codebase to automatically configure and run the WRF-Chem atmospheric model with specific emission inventories (NEI, MEGAN) and boundary conditions.

tools.name: PRROMenade
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable sequence classifier for taxonomic and functional classification
tools.detailed_description: A highly scalable sequence classifier that enables both taxonomic and functional classification of metagenomic reads.

tools.name: MNBC
tools.one_line_profile: Minimizer-based Naïve Bayes Classifier for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A multithreaded Minimizer-based Naïve Bayes Classifier designed for improved metagenomic sequence classification.

tools.name: blobtools
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization and QC tool for genome datasets
tools.detailed_description: A modular command-line solution for visualisation, quality control, and taxonomic partitioning of genome datasets (BlobPlots).

tools.name: centrifuge
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid and memory-efficient classifier for metagenomic sequences
tools.detailed_description: A novel microbial classification engine that enables rapid, accurate, and sensitive labeling of reads and quantification of species on desktop computers.

tools.name: kraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic sequence classification system using exact k-mer matches
tools.detailed_description: The second version of the Kraken taxonomic sequence classification system, which assigns taxonomic labels to short DNA reads with high accuracy and speed.

tools.name: VITAP
tools.one_line_profile: Viral taxonomic assignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed specifically for the taxonomic assignment of viral sequences in metagenomic data.

tools.name: scMAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-based classification for scRNA-seq annotation
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurately annotating scRNA-seq data using two rounds of reference-based classification.

tools.name: POx_POC_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Point of care species ID pipeline using Kraken2
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for point-of-care species identification using Kraken2 classification on Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) reads.

tools.name: GTDB-Tk
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic classifications to genomes
tools.detailed_description: A software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome Taxonomy Database (GTDB).

tools.name: flextaxd
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible Taxonomy Databases manager
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create, add, and merge different taxonomy sources (QIIME, GTDB, NCBI) and create custom metagenomic databases for tools like Kraken2 and Ganon.

tools.name: cuclark
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated metagenomic classifier
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomic classifier optimized for CUDA-enabled GPUs, providing high-performance sequence classification.

tools.name: scfa_predictions
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial community-scale metabolic modeling for SCFA production
tools.detailed_description: A modeling framework to predict personalized short-chain-fatty-acid (SCFA) production profiles in the human gut using microbial community data.

tools.name: HmmUFOtu
tools.one_line_profile: HMM and Phylogenetic Placement based Taxonomy Assignment Tool
tools.detailed_description: An Ultra-Fast Taxonomy Assignment Tool for 16S sequencing data utilizing Hidden Markov Models and phylogenetic placement.

tools.name: metagenomeFeatures
tools.one_line_profile: R package for annotating metagenomic datasets
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for annotating metagenomic datasets with taxonomic information, facilitating downstream analysis in R.

tools.name: Conifer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to calculate confidence scores from Kraken2 output
tools.detailed_description: A utility to calculate confidence scores for taxonomic classifications generated by Kraken2, improving the reliability of results.

tools.name: Kaiju (Space Science)
tools.one_line_profile: Multiscale Atmosphere-Geospace Environment (MAGE) model software
tools.detailed_description: Software suite including the MAGE model for simulation of heliospheric environments, planetary magnetospheres, and solar wind. (Note: Distinct from the bioinformatics tool Kaiju).

tools.name: Kaiju_to_kraken
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for Kaiju reports to Kraken format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert taxonomic classification reports from Kaiju format into Kraken report format for compatibility with downstream tools.

tools.name: mdmcleaner
tools.one_line_profile: Refinement tool for microbial dark matter SAGs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the assessment, classification, and refinement of Single Amplified Genomes (SAGs) and Metagenome Assembled Genomes (MAGs), specifically targeting microbial dark matter.

tools.name: Whokaryote
tools.one_line_profile: Random Forest classifier to distinguish eukaryotic and prokaryotic contigs in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Whokaryote uses gene structure features (intergenic distance, gene density, gene length, strand bias) to classify metagenomic contigs as eukaryotic or prokaryotic, facilitating the separation of host and microbial sequences.

tools.name: CAT/BAT/RAT
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of contigs and metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs)
tools.detailed_description: The Contig Annotation Tool (CAT) and Bin Annotation Tool (BAT) predict the taxonomy of contigs and MAGs using protein homology. RAT (Read Annotation Tool) provides taxonomic profiling for metagenomic reads.

tools.name: ViPER
tools.one_line_profile: Viral Metagenomics Pipeline for read trimming, assembly, and classification
tools.detailed_description: ViPER is a bioinformatics pipeline developed by the Matthijnssens Laboratory for processing viral metagenomics data, including steps for quality control, assembly, and taxonomic classification of contigs.

tools.name: TaxAss
tools.one_line_profile: 16S taxonomy assignment using ecosystem-specific databases
tools.detailed_description: TaxAss leverages ecosystem-specific databases (like FreshTrain) alongside global databases (like SILVA) to improve the resolution and accuracy of 16S rRNA gene taxonomy assignment.

tools.name: DeepMicrobes
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification for metagenomics using deep learning
tools.detailed_description: DeepMicrobes utilizes deep learning models (specifically attention-based architectures) to perform taxonomic classification of metagenomic reads, aiming to improve accuracy over traditional k-mer based methods.

tools.name: motus (R package)
tools.one_line_profile: R client for the Motus Wildlife Tracking System data
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to facilitate the import, cleaning, and analysis of data from the Motus Wildlife Tracking System, a global network for tracking small flying organisms.

tools.name: ViraMiner
tools.one_line_profile: CNN-based classifier for detecting viral sequences in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: ViraMiner employs a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture to identify viral contigs within metagenomic datasets, distinguishing them from host or bacterial sequences.

tools.name: perseq
tools.one_line_profile: Per-sequence functional classification and taxonomic assignments
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by PNNL for performing functional and taxonomic assignment on a per-sequence basis, aiding in the detailed characterization of metagenomic data.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools and pipelines for PacBio HiFi metagenomics data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and pipelines specifically tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomic studies, including taxonomic profiling and assembly.

tools.name: markerGeneProfile
tools.one_line_profile: Estimation of marker gene profiles for cell type identification
tools.detailed_description: An R package for estimating marker gene profiles, originally used in the NeuroExpresso project to identify cell-type specific signatures in transcriptomic data.

tools.name: assemblyqc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for evaluating genome assembly quality
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline designed to assess the quality of genome assemblies using various metrics and tools, ensuring data integrity for downstream analysis.

tools.name: WikiGenomesBase
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for creating organism-specific WikiGenomes applications
tools.detailed_description: A web application framework developed by SuLab to create model organism databases (like ChlamBase) by leveraging taxonomic, genetic, and functional data from Wikidata.

tools.name: MEGANet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-scale Edge-Guided Attention Network for polyp segmentation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of MEGANet, a deep learning model designed for accurate polyp segmentation in medical imaging, utilizing multi-scale edge-guided attention mechanisms.

tools.name: pyfastani
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for FastANI, a tool for whole-genome similarity estimation
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface and Cython bindings for FastANI, enabling fast alignment-free computation of Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI) for whole-genome comparisons.

tools.name: pysylph
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Sylph, a metagenomic profiling tool
tools.detailed_description: Provides a Python interface to Sylph, allowing for ultrafast containment ANI querying and taxonomic profiling of metagenomic samples directly from Python.

tools.name: tax_myPHAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic assignment workflow for bacteriophage genomes
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated workflow designed to assign taxonomy to bacteriophage genome isolates, streamlining the classification process for viral genomics.

tools.name: nxf-kraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Kraken2 and Bracken taxonomic classification
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline that encapsulates Kraken2 and Bracken execution within Docker containers, facilitating reproducible taxonomic classification of metagenomic data.

tools.name: kmertools
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer based feature extraction toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for extracting k-mer features from biological sequences, suitable for downstream bioinformatics analysis and machine learning applications in metagenomics.

tools.name: kraken2_classification
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Kraken2 metagenomic classification
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow developed by Bhatt Lab for automating metagenomic taxonomic classification using Kraken2, ensuring reproducible analysis.

tools.name: MiGA
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial Genomes Atlas for taxonomic classification and query
tools.detailed_description: A data management and analysis system for processing microbial genomes and metagenomes, providing taxonomic classification and novelty assessment against reference databases.

tools.name: MetaPhlAn
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic phylogenetic analysis tool for microbial profiling
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool for profiling the composition of microbial communities (Bacteria, Archaea and Eukaryotes) from metagenomic shotgun sequencing data using unique clade-specific marker genes.

tools.name: MelonnPan
tools.one_line_profile: Predictor of microbial community metabolic profiles
tools.detailed_description: A model-based computational method to predict the metabolic potential of microbial communities from their genomic content, linking taxonomy to function.

tools.name: PhyloPhlAn
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic analysis pipeline for microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: An integrated pipeline for large-scale phylogenetic analysis of microbial isolates and metagenome-assembled genomes, capable of building high-resolution phylogenies.

tools.name: Kaiju
tools.one_line_profile: Fast taxonomic classification using protein references
tools.detailed_description: A program for fast and sensitive taxonomic classification of high-throughput sequencing reads from metagenomic whole-genome sequencing, utilizing a protein reference database.

tools.name: Sylph
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast metagenomic profiling using containment ANI
tools.detailed_description: A method for ultrafast taxonomic profiling and genome querying of metagenomic samples, utilizing abundance-corrected MinHash for precise containment ANI estimation.

tools.name: MUSiCC
tools.one_line_profile: Marker gene-based metagenomic normalization tool
tools.detailed_description: A framework for metagenomic normalization and accurate profiling of gene abundances in the microbiome, correcting for average genome size variation using marker genes.

tools.name: Oral Microbiome Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic pipeline for taxonomic and functional profiling of the oral microbiome
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline designed to profile taxonomic and functional differences associated with oral health and disease using metagenomic data.

tools.name: Motu
tools.one_line_profile: High-efficiency web server for oceanographic data distribution
tools.detailed_description: Motu is a robust web server designed to handle, extract, and transform huge volumes of oceanographic data, filling the gap between heterogeneous data providers and end users.

tools.name: Motu Client Python
tools.one_line_profile: Python client for extracting and downloading oceanographic data from Motu servers
tools.detailed_description: A command-line client and Python library enabling users to extract and download oceanographic data handled by the Motu server.

tools.name: Marker-MAGu
tools.one_line_profile: Trans-Kingdom marker gene pipeline for taxonomic profiling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline utilizing marker genes for taxonomic profiling of human metagenomes, capable of handling trans-kingdom classification.

tools.name: MAGE
tools.one_line_profile: Multisource Attention Network for Hyperspectral and LiDAR Data Classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of the MAGE network for classification of remote sensing data (Hyperspectral and LiDAR), featuring discriminative graph and informative entities.

tools.name: Euryale
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline based on MEDUSA for the taxonomic classification and functional annotation of metagenomic sequencing reads.

tools.name: GMWI2
tools.one_line_profile: Gut Microbiome Wellness Index 2 for health status prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing the Gut Microbiome Wellness Index 2 to predict health status based on gut microbiome taxonomic profiles.

tools.name: TaxiBGC
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomy-guided profiling of biosynthetic gene clusters
tools.detailed_description: A taxonomy-guided approach for profiling experimentally characterized microbial biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) and secondary metabolite production potential in metagenomes.

tools.name: StringMeUp
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tool for Kraken 2 output reclassification
tools.detailed_description: A tool to reclassify Kraken 2 output based on confidence scores and/or minimum minimizer hit groups, improving classification accuracy.

tools.name: charcoal
tools.one_line_profile: Decontamination tool for genomes using k-mers and taxonomies
tools.detailed_description: A tool to remove contaminated contigs from genome assemblies by leveraging taxonomic information and k-mer composition.

tools.name: FragmentClassificationPackage
tools.one_line_profile: Homology and composition-based metagenomic fragment classifiers
tools.detailed_description: A collection of classifiers for assigning taxonomic attribution to metagenomic fragments using homology and composition-based methods.

tools.name: Kraken2 Server
tools.one_line_profile: Server implementation for Kraken2 taxonomic classifier
tools.detailed_description: A server wrapper for Kraken2, allowing taxonomic classification services to be deployed and accessed remotely.

tools.name: wf-metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic classification workflow for long-read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the taxonomic classification and analysis of long-read metagenomic sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore).

tools.name: Kun-peng
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast and low-memory taxonomy classifier
tools.detailed_description: Kun-peng is a Rust-based taxonomic classifier designed for high speed and low memory usage, suitable for metagenomic analysis.

tools.name: KrakenUniq
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomics classifier with unique k-mer counting
tools.detailed_description: KrakenUniq is a metagenomics classifier that extends Kraken by counting unique k-mers, providing higher specificity and better handling of false positives.

tools.name: metaphlan-plot-by-taxa
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization script for MetaPhlAn taxonomic profiles
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to convert MetaPhlAn metagenomic profile outputs into taxa-level plots using Bokeh and Phyloseq.

tools.name: parse_kraken2_report
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomically informed parsing of Kraken2 reports
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for parsing Kraken2 report outputs with taxonomic awareness, facilitating downstream analysis.

tools.name: stampa
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence Taxonomic Assignment by Massive Pairwise Alignments
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for taxonomic assignment of sequences based on massive pairwise alignments, suitable for metabarcoding or metagenomic studies.

tools.name: tagme
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic Assignment of Genetic Markers for Ecology
tools.detailed_description: An R package for the taxonomic assignment of genetic markers, designed for ecological studies.

tools.name: TRANA
tools.one_line_profile: EMU-based pipeline for long-read 16S rRNA taxonomic profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline utilizing EMU for optimized taxonomic profiling of long 16S rRNA sequencing reads.

tools.name: PhyloSift
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic and taxonomic analysis for genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for phylogenetic and taxonomic analysis of genomic and metagenomic data, focusing on marker genes.

tools.name: sepia
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classifier based on Kraken2 algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of a taxonomic classifier utilizing algorithms similar to Kraken2, optimized for performance.

tools.name: MATAFILER
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenomic assembly and profiling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for metagenomic assembly, genome reconstruction, and both functional and taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: deSAMBA
tools.one_line_profile: Fast classification of metagenomics long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for fast and accurate classification of metagenomics long reads using sparse approximate matches.

tools.name: barbet
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic Classification of Bacteria and Archaea Genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the taxonomic classification of Bacteria and Archaea genomes.

tools.name: MALT
tools.one_line_profile: Sequence alignment and analysis tool for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: MALT (MEGAN Alignment Tool) is a sequence alignment and analysis tool designed for processing high-throughput sequencing data, specifically for metagenomic analysis, integrating with MEGAN.

tools.name: MEGAN-CE
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tool for metagenome analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: MEGAN (MEtaGenome ANalyzer) Community Edition is a comprehensive toolbox for interactively analyzing and comparing microbiome data, performing taxonomic and functional analysis.

tools.name: spideog
tools.one_line_profile: Command line utility for parsing Kraken2 reports
tools.detailed_description: A command-line utility designed to process and summarize Kraken2 taxonomic classification reports, facilitating downstream analysis.

tools.name: Bracken
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Reestimation of Abundance with Kraken
tools.detailed_description: Bracken is a highly accurate statistical method that computes the abundance of species in DNA sequences from a metagenomics sample by re-estimating abundances from Kraken classification results.

tools.name: KrakenTools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of scripts for Kraken/Bracken downstream analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to analyze, filter, and visualize output files from Kraken, Kraken2, Bracken, and KrakenUniq taxonomic classifiers.

tools.name: TaxTriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for microbial identification and classification
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed to agnostically identify and classify microbial organisms within short- or long-read metagenomic NGS data.

tools.name: MetaPrism
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomical and functional profiling for shotgun metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing simultaneous taxonomical and functional profiling of shotgun metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: Leviathan
tools.one_line_profile: Fast taxonomic and pathway profiler for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A fast, memory-efficient, and scalable taxonomic and pathway profiler designed for (pan)genome-resolved metagenomics and metatranscriptomics.

tools.name: Gracken
tools.one_line_profile: Phylogenetic tree generator from Kraken/Bracken reports
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create phylogenetic trees directly from Bracken or Kraken2 classification reports for visualization and analysis.

tools.name: Recentrifuge
tools.one_line_profile: Comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: Recentrifuge enables robust comparative analysis and contamination removal for metagenomics, providing interactive visualization of taxonomic classification results.

tools.name: brocc
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus taxonomy assignment for short reads
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for consensus taxonomy assignment of short reads, particularly optimized for fungal ITS sequences.

tools.name: CREST
tools.one_line_profile: Classification Resources for Environmental Sequence Tags
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software and databases for taxonomic classification of environmental marker genes from sequencing-based community profiling studies.

tools.name: TAXADIVA
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomy Assignment and Diversity Assessment
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper script for facilitating taxonomy assignment and diversity assessment of nifH amplicon sequences.

tools.name: DeepMicrobes
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for taxonomic classification of metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning architecture designed for taxonomic classification of shotgun metagenomic reads, capable of identifying species with high accuracy.

tools.name: BTyper3
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of Bacillus cereus group genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for in silico taxonomic classification, virulence gene detection, and antimicrobial resistance gene detection in Bacillus cereus group genomes.

tools.name: MyTaxa
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced taxonomy classifier for genomic and metagenomic sequences
tools.detailed_description: MyTaxa is an advanced taxonomy classifier designed to identify the taxonomic origin of unknown genomic and metagenomic sequences.

tools.name: RecoverY
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer based read classification for Y-chromosome sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses k-mer based read classification to identify Y-chromosome specific reads for sequencing and assembly purposes.

tools.name: kraken-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for Kraken2 analysis
tools.detailed_description: A simple and reproducible Nextflow pipeline for running Kraken2 taxonomic classification on sequencing data.

tools.name: FOCUS
tools.one_line_profile: Agile Profiler for Metagenomic Data
tools.detailed_description: FOCUS is a tool for agile and efficient taxonomic profiling of metagenomic data, designed to handle large datasets.

tools.name: snake_gtdbtk
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for GTDB-Tk
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow wrapper for running GTDB-Tk, a toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes.

tools.name: submg
tools.one_line_profile: ENA metagenome upload tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to facilitate the submission and upload of metagenomic data to the European Nucleotide Archive (ENA).

tools.name: Meteor
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for quantitative metagenomics profiling
tools.detailed_description: Meteor is a platform for quantitative metagenomics profiling of complex ecosystems, relying on gene catalogues to perform species-level taxonomic profiling and functional analysis.

tools.name: MEGAN (Molecule Edit GAN)
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Attention Network for modeling chemical reactions
tools.detailed_description: MEGAN (Molecule Edit Graph Attention Network) is a deep learning model for modeling chemical reactions as sequences of graph edits, useful for reaction prediction.

tools.name: ANIclustermap
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for drawing ANI clustermaps for microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to calculate Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI) and generate clustermaps for all-vs-all comparisons of microbial genomes.

tools.name: mOTUs
tools.one_line_profile: Marker gene-based OTU profiling tool
tools.detailed_description: mOTUs is a tool for taxonomic profiling of metagenomic samples using marker gene-based operational taxonomic units (mOTUs), enabling precise quantification of known and unknown species.

tools.name: Centrifuger
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient taxonomic classifier for sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: Centrifuger is a taxonomic classifier for sequencing reads (short and long) that uses an FM-index with run-block compressed BWT for high efficiency.

tools.name: Cenote-Taker
tools.one_line_profile: Viral discovery and annotation tool (Deprecated)
tools.detailed_description: Cenote-Taker is a tool for the discovery and annotation of viral sequences in metagenomic data. (Note: Deprecated in favor of Cenote-Taker 3).

tools.name: MetaCache
tools.one_line_profile: Memory efficient and fast taxonomic classification system for metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool designed for memory-efficient, fast, and precise taxonomic classification of metagenomic reads, suitable for large-scale analysis.

tools.name: SSUnique
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for processing unclassified or rare fractions of SSU rRNA gene sequence libraries
tools.detailed_description: Generates network-based visualizations of taxonomic assignments and extracts unclassified or rare sequence groups to filter for phylogenetic novelty.

tools.name: nf-core/createtaxdb
tools.one_line_profile: Automated construction of metagenomic classifier databases
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the parallelised and automated construction of databases for various metagenomic classifiers.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to investigate horizontal gene transfer from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect and investigate horizontal gene transfer events using Next Generation Sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and binning pipeline for metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for the assembly, binning, and quality assessment of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline for metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelised pipeline for multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data using various tools.

tools.name: Kraken2-output-manipulation
tools.one_line_profile: Script to combine and manipulate Kraken2 output reports
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that aggregates individual Kraken2 reports into a single file for easier downstream analysis.

tools.name: VirusTaxo
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of viruses using k-mer enrichment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the taxonomic classification of viruses directly from genome sequences based on k-mer enrichment strategies.

tools.name: HoloVir
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic and functional characterisation of viral metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A robust data analysis pipeline providing an optimised workflow for the taxonomic and functional characterisation of viral metagenomes.

tools.name: filter_classified_reads
tools.one_line_profile: Filter reads based on Kraken2/Centrifuge classification
tools.detailed_description: A utility to filter sequencing reads belonging to taxa of interest based on classification results from Kraken2 or Centrifuge.

tools.name: Genestrip
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient read classification and filtering for selected species
tools.detailed_description: A Java tool for efficient read classification, filtering, and k-mer counting, targeting selected groups of species.

tools.name: thinspace
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomy-free method to dereplicate massive genome collections
tools.detailed_description: A tool for dereplicating large genome collections without relying on taxonomy, useful for creating non-redundant datasets.

tools.name: DUDes
tools.one_line_profile: Top-down taxonomic profiler for metagenomics and metaproteomics
tools.detailed_description: A taxonomic profiler that uses a top-down approach to classify sequences in metagenomic and metaproteomic datasets.

tools.name: ganon
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient taxonomic classification and profiling tool
tools.detailed_description: Classifies genomic sequences against large reference sets efficiently, supporting database updates, binning, and hierarchical classification.

tools.name: genome_updater
tools.one_line_profile: Script to download and update NCBI genome snapshots
tools.detailed_description: A bash script for downloading and updating non-redundant snapshots of NCBI Genomes (RefSeq/GenBank) with advanced filtering and GTDB integration.

tools.name: MetaBench
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to run and benchmark metagenomics tools
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to facilitate the benchmarking of metagenomics tools, covering database construction, binning, and profiling.

tools.name: download-refseq-genomes
tools.one_line_profile: Script to download genomes within a clade from NCBI Refseq
tools.detailed_description: A Perl script that automates the downloading of genome sequences for specific clades from the NCBI RefSeq database.

tools.name: Dynamic Meta-Storms
tools.one_line_profile: Calculates taxonomic and phylogenetic distances of shotgun metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate comprehensive taxonomic and phylogenetic distances/dissimilarities of shotgun metagenomes at the species level.

tools.name: metakraken
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Kraken2 and Bracken taxonomic profiling
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline using Snakemake to process metagenomics samples through Kraken2 and Bracken to generate taxonomic profiles.

tools.name: speciateIT
tools.one_line_profile: Fast taxonomic assignments for human vaginal microbiota
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for fast and accurate taxonomic assignments, specifically optimized for the human vaginal microbiota.

tools.name: Kraken-Bracken-plot
tools.one_line_profile: Creates stacked bar plots from Kraken and Bracken output
tools.detailed_description: A Python script to generate visualization (stacked bar plots) from the output files of Kraken and Bracken classifiers.

tools.name: KMCP
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate metagenomic profiling and fast sequence searching
tools.detailed_description: A tool for accurate metagenomic profiling and fast large-scale sequence/genome searching using k-mer based methods.

tools.name: taxonomizr
tools.one_line_profile: R package to parse NCBI taxonomy and find assignments
tools.detailed_description: An R package to parse NCBI taxonomy dumps and accessions to efficiently find taxonomic assignments for sequences.

tools.name: MEGAnE
tools.one_line_profile: Mobile Element Genotyping Analysis Environment
tools.detailed_description: A tool for genotyping mobile elements, particularly useful in long-read sequencing contexts.

tools.name: kraken2OTUtable
tools.one_line_profile: Creates OTU table from Kraken2 report
tools.detailed_description: A script to convert Kraken2 classification reports into a simple OTU (Operational Taxonomic Unit) table format.

tools.name: AMR-meta
tools.one_line_profile: Classifier for metagenomics data using k-mers and matrix factorization
tools.detailed_description: A tool for classifying metagenomic data, specifically focusing on Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR), using k-mer and matrix factorization techniques.

tools.name: Metabuli
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic classification via joint analysis of DNA and amino acid
tools.detailed_description: A specific and sensitive metagenomic classification tool that jointly analyzes DNA and amino acid sequences.

tools.name: PLoT-ME
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-classification of Long-reads for Memory Efficient Taxonomic assignment
tools.detailed_description: A tool to pre-classify long-read sequencing data (Nanopore/PacBio) to enable memory-efficient taxonomic assignment with tools like Kraken2 or Centrifuge.

tools.name: Read2Ring
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to generate Krona charts from SRA accessions using Kraken2
tools.detailed_description: A bash-based pipeline that automates the process of generating Krona visualization charts from SRA accessions via Kraken2 classification.

tools.name: MetaWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-marker metabarcode pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A flexible multi-marker metabarcode pipeline for processing paired-end Illumina reads from raw fastq files to taxonomic assignments.

tools.name: Motus
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular structure generation model using multi-modal graph diffusion
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Motus, a deep learning model for generating molecular structures, typically used in drug discovery and cheminformatics.

tools.name: Lemur
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic profiling tool optimized for long-read metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: Lemur is designed for rapid and accurate taxonomic profiling specifically on long-read metagenomic datasets, addressing the challenges of high error rates in long reads.

tools.name: LOMA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for classification, alignment, and assembly of nanopore metagenomic reads
tools.detailed_description: LOMA is a Nextflow pipeline developed by UKHSA for processing nanopore metagenomic data, integrating classification, alignment, and assembly steps.

tools.name: UMGAP
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance taxonomic classifier for shotgun metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: The Unipept Metagenomics Analysis Pipeline (UMGAP) is a tool for tryptic peptide-based taxonomic profiling of metagenomic shotgun reads, optimized for speed and precision.

tools.name: SingleM
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial community profiling tool using single-copy marker genes
tools.detailed_description: SingleM is a tool for profiling the community composition of metagenomes by identifying and counting single-copy marker genes, suitable for estimating genome coverage and taxonomy.

tools.name: MetaKSSD
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment-free metagenome taxonomic profiling tool
tools.detailed_description: MetaKSSD is a memory-efficient and fast tool for metagenomic taxonomic classification using sketch-based strategies (KSSD) for sequence comparison.

tools.name: stag
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical taxonomic classifier for metagenomic marker genes
tools.detailed_description: Stag is a tool developed by the Zeller Lab for hierarchical taxonomic classification of metagenomic sequences, often used in conjunction with mOTUs profiling.
